961870.name: Toltec and the mysteries of the Secret Island
961870.description:
The planet Durrall is dying . After the attack of Lord Voldnum, the Kinematic engine of the planet stopped working. The remaining Testrasterakt orbs was stolen by K-Kryous the young apprentice of Lord Voldnum. You Tarran of Durrall, you must return to earth and to the secret island of the Toltecs to collect the last Testrasterakt orbs which was hidden by Lord Rhess the oldest of the Elders Durralians. The island is full of traps ,enemies and mysterious enigmas.The future of Durrall is on you now.

KEY FEATURES:

-Stunning 2D hand-painted graphics.

-Challenging and unique gameplay based on the “hard to beat” 90s arcade games.

-Atmospheric sounds and visuals that will make you “feel” the game environment.

-Unique and simple mouse-only controlled gameplay suitable for gamers with disabilities.

-Secret treasures and passages that make the game even more challenging.

-A gallery of concept art.
961870.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
